truth_or_dare.description: A classic game of choices. Do you want to be honest, or do you want to be bold?

steps.title: Make Your Choice
steps.description: The player must choose 'Truth' or 'Dare' before seeing the card.

steps.title: Reveal the Card
steps.description: Tap the button to reveal the question or challenge.

steps.title: Perform or Forfeit
steps.description: Answer the question honestly or do the dare. If you refuse, take a drink!

trivia.description: Test your brain power against the clock.

steps.title: Read Question
steps.description: A question will appear with multiple choices.

steps.title: Beat the Clock
steps.description: Select the correct answer before the timer runs out.

steps.title: Score Points
steps.description: Pass the phone around. Whoever gets the most right wins!

charades.description: Guess the word on the screen based on your friends' acting!

steps.title: Place on Forehead
steps.description: Hold the phone against your forehead so friends can see the screen, but you can't.

steps.title: Friends Act
steps.description: Your friends act out the word. No talking allowed!

steps.title: Tilt to Score
steps.description: Tilt phone DOWN if you guess right. Tilt UP to pass.

nhie.description: Expose your friends' secrets. If you've done it, you drink!

steps.title: Read the Statement
steps.description: Read the 'Never Have I Ever...' card out loud.

steps.title: Guilty?
steps.description: If you HAVE done the thing on the card, take a sip of your drink.

steps.title: Story Time
steps.description: If only one person drinks, they have to tell the story!

most_likely.description: Gather around and find out who fits the description best.

steps.title: Read Aloud
steps.description: One person reads the card on the screen out loud to the group.

steps.title: Think & Wait
steps.description: Everyone thinks of who fits the description best. Wait for the countdown...

steps.title: 3.. 2.. 1.. Point!
steps.description: When the timer hits zero, everyone points at the person they chose.

steps.title: The Verdict
steps.description: The person with the most fingers pointing at them takes a penalty!

deep_dive.description: Skip the small talk. A game about connection, perception, and vulnerability.

steps.title: Ask & Answer
steps.description: Read the card aloud. Be honest. There are no wrong answers, just real ones.

steps.title: Watch for Wildcards
steps.description: Tap to flip. If it's a Wildcard on the back, you must perform the action immediately.

steps.title: Connect
steps.description: Listen to understand, not just to reply. This game is about knowing people better.

hot_takes.description: Spark the conversation. Debate red flags, grill your friends, or solve ethical dilemmas.

steps.title: Reveal the Topic
steps.description: Tap the card to flip it and reveal the question, scenario, or dilemma.

steps.title: Discuss & Debate
steps.description: The group discusses the card. Fight for your opinion or roast the person in the Hot Seat.

steps.title: Next Round
steps.description: Once the debate settles, tap Next to keep the energy moving.
